title: Fragment, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton 
Technique: roller printed on plain weave
dimensions: Warp: 41.5 cm (16 1/4 in.). Weft: (selvage to selvage) 63 cm (24 3/4 in.)
description: Two scenes: an Indian on horseback spearing a buffalo and cowboys wrangling a group of horses. The two scenes are surrounded by large floral motifs.  Predominantly reds, pinks and white on a dark brown background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 19th century.
late 19th century. Medium: cotton 
Technique: roller printed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-274.
